tool_description: Discover the ultimate solution for temporary email needs with "Ultimate Temp Mail API" – the epitome of affordability, user-friendliness, and limitless possibilities. Embrace the cheapest option on the market that doesn't compromise on ease of use. Enjoy the freedom of unlimited usages, all while relishing the convenience of free plans. Elevate your temporary email experience to the next level with the ultimate choice – Ultimate Temp Mail API.
name: ULTIMATE TEMP MAIL API
title: ULTIMATE TEMP MAIL API

api_list.name: Get Messages
api_list.description: Get messages of a specify address

api_list.name: Generate Custom Mail Address
api_list.description:
**this endpoint Generates Custom name for temp email address**
**Please Wait 15 to 20 second before fetching messages it may take 15 to 20 second to appear the message**

api_list.name: Generate Random Temporary Email Address
api_list.description:
**This endpoint Generates Random temporary email address to use**
**Please Wait 15 to 20 second before fetching messages it may take 15 to 20 second to appear the message**
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ultimate-temp-mail-api.p.rapidapi.com/generate-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultimate-temp-mail-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ultimate-temp-mail-api.p.rapidapi.com/generate-mail"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ultimate-temp-mail-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
